name: Aaron
hints: Lived from 1597 to 1474

name: Abel

name: Abigail
hints: Good in discretion and beautiful in form

Husband's name was Nabel
Husband did not value David's help

name: Abner
hints: Meaning of name 'father is a lamp'

Suffered crushing defeat by Joab
Abandoned the opposition, made friends with David

name: Abraham

name: Absalom

Developed a traitorous disposition

name: Adam

name: Ahasuerus

name: Andrew

name: Asa

name: Athaliah

name: Benjamin

name: Bull

King of Judah who reigned 52 years
Became famous for his military successes

Furthered agriculture, hewed out cisterns

Stricken with leprosy, removed of kingly duties
